description: The Centaur people form an alliance with Warforged Empire.
Explorers from Goblin Empire uncover ancient relics of the Hobgoblin.
A bloody war erupts between the Genasi and Hobgoblin Empire.
A rebellion led by Warforged dissidents shakes Goliath Empire.
Explorers from Goliath Empire uncover ancient relics of the Human.
The Tiefling invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Half-Elf Empire.
The Goliath people form an alliance with Minotaur Empire.
A rebellion led by Minotaur dissidents shakes Halfling Empire.
A rebellion led by Hobgoblin dissidents shakes Gnome Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Goliath and Gnome Empire.
The Hobgoblin invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Aasimar Empire.
Natural disasters ravage Warforged Empire, decimating the Halfling population.
A bloody war erupts between the Elf and Tiefling Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Half-Orc and Half-Orc Empire.
Explorers from Half-Orc Empire uncover ancient relics of the Goblin.
A rebellion led by Hobgoblin dissidents shakes Kobold Empire.
A rebellion led by Human dissidents shakes Minotaur Empire.
The Dwarf migrate en masse toward the borders of Half-Elf Empire.
The Kobold migrate en masse toward the borders of Kobold Empire.
The Genasi invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Aasimar Empire.
A terrible plague spreads through Tiefling Empire, striking both Kalashtar and allies.
The Aasimar people form an alliance with Gnome Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Half-Elf and Aasimar Empire.
The Human migrate en masse toward the borders of Genasi Empire.
The Kobold people form an alliance with Dwarf Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Shifter and Minotaur Empire.
